dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.resource.spec.catalog.ResourceCandidate
dataStructure.description:
A ResourceCandidate is an entity that enables the ResourceSpecifications to a catalog. A ResourceCandidate and its ResourceSpecification may be published - made visible - in any number of ResourceCatalogs, or in none. One ResourceSpecification can be composed of other ResourceSpecifications.

This entity is optional
dataStructure.label: ResourceCandidate

child.name: iD
child.description:
A unique identifier for the ResourceCandidate.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is mandatory

This attribute is AVC enabled
child.label: iD

child.name: name
child.description:
The word or phrase by which a ResourceCandidate is known and distinguished from other ResourceCandidate.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is mandatory

This attribute is AVC enabled
child.label: name

child.name: description
child.description:
A narrative that explains the ResourceCandidate.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional

This attribute is AVC enabled
child.label: description

child.name: validFor
child.description:
The period of time during which the ResourceCandidate is applicable.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is mandatory

This attribute is AVC enabled
child.label: validFor

child.name: status
child.description:
The condition in which the ResourceCandidate exists such as Planned, Active or Obsolete.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is mandatory

This attribute is AVC enabled
child.label: status

child.name: resourceSpecification
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity 0..1

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is unique

This association end is an end of association ResourceSpecificationMadeAavailableAs

This association end is optional
child.label: resourceSpecification

child.name: productOffering
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity *

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is unique

This association end is an end of association ProductOfferingCanRefer

This association end is optional
child.label: productOffering

child.name: resourcecatalog
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity *

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is unique

This association end is an end of association ResCatalogResCandidate

This association end is optional
child.label: resourcecatalog

child.name: serviceCandidate
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity *

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is unique

This association end is an end of association ServiceCandidateCanRefer

This association end is optional
child.label: serviceCandidate
